```{r}

install.packages("quantmod")
library(quantmod)

```



```{r}
#Define start and End dates
start <- as.Date("2018-01-01")
end <- as.Date("2019-04-02")


getSymbols(c("AAPL", "AMD"), src="yahoo", from = start, to = end)
?getSymbols

class(AAPL)
head(AMD)
tail(AMD)
```
